text: Kenana, kapherara tadera antare murkhatayugera jeda posana karata. Atahpara allaha tamra rasula o muminadera upara sbiya prasanti nayila karalena ebam tadera jan'ye sanyamera dayitba apariharya kare dilena. Bastutah tara'i chila era adhikatara yogya o upayukta. Allaha sarbabisaye samyaka jnata.
